claim.content.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains the content of the original claim that was reported to Check.

claim.firstSeen.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains the date that the original claim was first reported via Check.

claim.media.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains a link to the main "original source" of the claim that was reported to check. It can be a link to an image file, or to a web site.

claim.similarMedia.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains the number of similar media items to this claim in Check.

claim.source.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains the URL of the original claim that was reported to Check.

claim.url.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains the URL of the original claim that was reported to Check.

filters.archived.developer_comment: This is a heading that will be immediately followed by checkboxes that let you filter search items by whether they have been moved to the trash.

filters.organizations.developer_comment: This is a heading that will be immediately followed by a list of known publishing organizations that the user can choose from.

filters.published.developer_comment: This is a heading that will be immediately followed by checkboxes that let you filter search items by whether they have been published or not.

filters.type.developer_comment: This is a heading that will be immediately followed by a list of types of content (image, text, video) that the user can choose from.

search.action.developer_comment: This is a verb that indicates the user is going to search a database for records based on a query they typed.

search.genericError.developer_comment: This message appears when we don't know why an error has occurred during a search. Otherwise we show the real error.
search.genericError.string: حدث خطأ ما خلال قيامك بالبحث.

search.image.developer_comment: This is a label on a button that the user presses in order to upload an image file that will then be searched for. This action opens a file picker prompt.

search.noResults.developer_comment: A message that appears when a user searches for similar items, but we could not find any results.

search.title.developer_comment: This is the title of the application.

select.publishers.developer_comment: This is a prompt in a text box that lets the user know they can select one or more specific publishers from a popop list.

sidebar.filters.developer_comment: A header field for a list of different filters. A plural noun, not an imperative verb.

sidebar.similarity.developer_comment: This is a section header, letting the user know that the options inside relate to making their search results more or less similar to their query.

sort.published.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains the date that items were published on.

sort.report.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table, referring to the fact that this column contains the main content of reports created by Check analysts.

sort.score.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains a numerical score telling the user how similar a particular search result is to their query.

sort.sent.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains the number of times this item was sent on social media.

sort.status.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains a field saying whether a fact-checked claim or report was deemed false or true.

sort.url.developer_comment: This is a header for a column in a search results table that contains a URL as a hyperlink the user can click on to view the original article the claim is about.
